analyzer/src/data_quality/MDQ_DigitizerOverflow.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003 Name:         MDQ_DigitizerOverflow
00004 Created by:   Joe Grange
00005 
00006 Contents:     hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction
00007               - plots the fraction of TPIs with any sample above the 
00008                 largest possible ADC value for each channel
00009 
00010               hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent
00011               - plots the fraction of TPIs with any sample above the 
00012                 largest possible ADC value for each channel on an
00013                 event-by-event basis
00014 
00015               hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total
00016               - plots the total number of TPulseIslands in each channel
00017                 (for normalisation of hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction)
00018 
00019               hDQ_DigitizerOverFlow_TotalByEvent
00020               - plots total number of TPulseIslands in each channel on
00021                 an event-by-event basis (for normalisation hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent)
00022 
00023 \********************************************************************/
00024

00057 extern HNDLE hDB;
00058 extern TGlobalData* gData;
00059 extern TSetupData* gSetup;

00061 static TH2* hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent;
00062 static TH2* hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_TotalByEvent;
00063 static TH1* hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction;
00064 static TH1* hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total;

00082 INT MDQ_DigitizerOverflow_init()
00083 {
00084     // See if the DataQuality_LowLevel/ directory already exists
00085   if (!gDirectory->Cd("DataQuality_LowLevel")) {
00086     
00087     std::string dir_name("DataQuality_LowLevel/");
00088     gDirectory->mkdir(dir_name.c_str());
00089     gDirectory->Cd(dir_name.c_str());
00090   }
00091 
00092   // Get run number
00093   char key_name[80];
00094   int size,run_number;
00095   sprintf(key_name, "Runinfo/Run number");
00096   size=sizeof(int);
00097   db_get_value(hDB,0,key_name, &run_number, &size, TID_INT,1);
00098 
00099   // Create the histograms
00100   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction = new TH1D("hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction",Form("Fraction of TPIs with at least one overflow sample value, run %d",run_number),1,0,1);
00101   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00102   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Bank (Detector)");
00103   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Fraction of TPIs with overflow samples");
00104 
00105   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total = new TH1D("hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total", "Total number of TPIs (for normalization)",1,0,1);
00106   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00107   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Bank (Detector)");
00108   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of TPIs with overflow samples");
00109 
00110   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent = new TH2D("hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent", Form("Fraction of TPIs with at least one sample overflow value, run %d",run_number),1,0,1, 5000,0,5000);
00111   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00112   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Bank (Detector)");
00113   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("MIDAS event number");
00114 
00115   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_TotalByEvent = new TH2I("hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_TotalByEvent", "Total number of TPIs (for normalization)",1,0,1, 5000,0,5000);
00116   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_TotalByEvent->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00117   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_TotalByEvent->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Bank (Detector)");
00118   hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_TotalByEvent->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("MIDAS event number");
00119 
00120   // We want the number of x-bins to be the same in all the histograms so that we
00121   // can use the TrendPlot macro (which doesn't check that bin labels are the same)
00122   std::map<std::string, std::string> bank_to_detector_map = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00123   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = bank_to_detector_map.begin(); 
00124       mapIter != bank_to_detector_map.end(); mapIter++) { 
00125 
00126     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00127     std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00128     std::string binname = bankname + "(" + detname + ")";
00129 
00130     hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->Fill(binname.c_str(), 0);
00131     hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->Fill(binname.c_str(), 0);
00132     hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent->Fill(binname.c_str(), 0.0, 0.0);
00133     hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_TotalByEvent->Fill(binname.c_str(), 0.0, 0.0);
00134   }
00135 
00136   gDirectory->Cd("/MidasHists/");
00137   return SUCCESS;
00138 }
00139 
00142 INT MDQ_DigitizerOverflow(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00143 {
00144         // Get the event number
00145         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00146 
00147         bool pulse_overflow = 0;
00148         int overflow_value = 0;
00149 
00150         // Some typedefs
00151         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00152         typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00153         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00154 
00155         // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00156         // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00157         TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00158                 gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00159 
00160         // Loop over the map and get each bankname, vector pair
00161         for (map_iterator mapIter = pulse_islands_map.begin(); mapIter != pulse_islands_map.end(); ++mapIter) 
00162         {
00163           std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00164           std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00165           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> thePulses = mapIter->second;
00166 
00167           int n_bits = gSetup->GetNBits(bankname);
00168           overflow_value = std::pow(2, n_bits) - 1;
00169 
00170           // Loop over the TPulseIslands and plot the histogram
00171           for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator pulseIter = thePulses.begin(); pulseIter != thePulses.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00172 
00173             pulse_overflow = 0;
00174 
00175             //loop over samples, check for overflow value
00176             const std::vector<int>& theSamples = (*pulseIter)->GetSamples();
00177             for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator sampleIter = theSamples.begin(); sampleIter != theSamples.end(); ++sampleIter){
00178               int sample_number = sampleIter - theSamples.begin();
00179               int sample_value = *sampleIter;
00180 
00181               if (sample_value >= overflow_value){
00182                 //printf(" sample overflow! sample #%d value %d midas event #%d bankname %s detname %s\n",sample_number,sample_value,midas_event_number,bankname.c_str(),detname.c_str());
00183                 pulse_overflow = 1;
00184 
00185               }
00186                 
00187             
00188               std::string binname = bankname + "(" + detname + ")";
00189               hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->Fill(binname.c_str(),1);
00190               hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_TotalByEvent->Fill(binname.c_str(),midas_event_number,1);
00191               if ((pulse_overflow)){
00192                 hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->Fill(binname.c_str(),1);
00193                 hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent->Fill(binname.c_str(),midas_event_number,1);
00194                 //printf(" total pulses %d integral %f\n",total_pulses,hDQ_ADCSampleOverflow->Integral());
00195               }
00196 
00197             }
00198           }
00199         }
00200 
00201         return SUCCESS;
00202 }
00203 
00206 INT MDQ_DigitizerOverflow_eor(INT run_number) {
00207 
00208 //Total hist has more bins than overflow hist (includes banks with no overflow samples)
00209 int nBanksTotal = hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->GetNbinsX();
00210 int nBanksOverflow = hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->GetNbinsX();
00211 int nMidasEvents = hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent->GetNbinsY();
00212 int nOverflow = 0;
00213 int nTotal = 0;
00214 
00215 //look for matching bank names, scale
00216 for (int i=1; i<=nBanksTotal; i++){
00217   //printf(" bin i: %d total label i %s\n",i,hDQ_ADCSampleTotal->GetXaxis()->GetBinLabel(i));
00218   for (int j=1; j<=nBanksOverflow; j++){
00219     //printf(" bin j %d overflow label %s\n",j,hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->GetXaxis()->GetBinLabel(j));
00220     if (strcmp(hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->GetXaxis()->GetBinLabel(i),hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->GetXaxis()->GetBinLabel(j))==0){
00221         nOverflow = 0;
00222         nOverflow = hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->GetBinContent(j); 
00223         nTotal = 0;
00224         nTotal = hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->GetBinContent(i);
00225 
00226         //printf("match! total label %s overflow label %s\n",hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->GetXaxis()->GetBinLabel(i),hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->GetXaxis()->GetBinLabel(j));
00227         if (nTotal>0) hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Fraction->SetBinContent(j,(double)nOverflow/nTotal);
00228         
00229         for (int k=1; k<nMidasEvents; k++){
00230           nOverflow = 0;
00231           nOverflow = hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent->GetBinContent(j,k);
00232           nTotal = 0;
00233           nTotal = hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_TotalByEvent->GetBinContent(i,k);//i,k to match banks
00234           if (nTotal>0 && nOverflow>0){
00235             hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_FractionByEvent->SetBinContent(j,k,(double)nOverflow/nTotal);
00236             //printf(" bankname %s midas event %d nOverflow is %d nTotal is %d ratio is %f\n",hDQ_DigitizerOverflow_Total->GetXaxis()->GetBinLabel(i),k,nOverflow,nTotal,(float)nOverflow/nTotal);
00237           }  
00238       }
00239     }
00240   }
00241 }
00242 
00243 return SUCCESS;
00244 
00245 }
